translation.en: In nomine Patris et Filii et Spiritus Sancti. Amen.
Amen.
Hannah.
Hannah.
Hannah.
No.
God himself commands you,
depart from the body of Hannah Grace, you demon,
along with every satanic power of the enemy,
along with every specter from hell.
Stop!
Hannah, I know you're in there.
translation.ko: 한나, 내 말 듣고 있는 거 안다

translation.en: You have to fight, baby.
Fight it, Hannah.
Fight it. Fight it, Hannah.
[SOBBING] You have to fight.
Baby, it's me.
Dad. Daddy's here, baby.
Dad. Honey. Baby.
Dad.
[STUTTERING] You have to fight.
In the name of the Father, in the name of the Son,
in the name of the Holy Spirit.
Hannah, stop!
No.
DEMON: Your whore daughter is mine.
She's mine forever.
Forgive me.
LISA [ON VOICE MAIL]: Meg. Hey, it's Lisa. I just talked to Dr. Lewis
translation.ko: 메건, 리사예요 루이스 선생님과 얘기했는데 만나보고 싶으시대요

translation.en: and you're good to go, so maybe you can
translation.ko: 루이스 선생님과 얘기했는데 만나보고 싶으시대요 오늘 오후에 오셔도 돼요

translation.en: come in this afternoon. Okay, bye.
Hey.
You look nervous. Are you okay?
It's a job interview. I think I'm supposed to be nervous.
Okay. Come on, let's go get a coffee.
translation.ko: - 당연히 긴장되죠 - 그렇네요 가서 커피 한잔하죠

translation.en: LISA: This will be good.
We'll go to meetings in the morning after our shifts end
and I'll be three floors up, so if you need anything...
translation.ko: 전 3층 위에서 일하니까 필요한 게 있으면...

translation.en: You know?
Thank you for this.
Don't thank me yet. You still have to meet Dr. Lewis.
translation.ko: 아직 고마워하긴 일러요 루이스 선생님도 봬야죠

translation.en: DR. LEWIS: This job is not for everyone.
translation.ko: 아무나 할 수 있는 일이 아니에요

translation.en: We've had three overnight intake assistants
in the last six months alone.
Because of the hours?
No, because it's a thankless, solitary position.
The smell. You never get used to the smell.
I was a cop. I'm totally used to bad smells.
Lisa mentioned that there were issues.
translation.ko: 리사 말로는 문제가 좀 있었다고 하던데요

translation.en: Yes. There were issues. But I'm much better now.
translation.ko: 네, 문제가 좀 있었죠 지금은 괜찮아졌어요

translation.en: Well, she assured me that you could handle the job.
translation.ko: 리사는 당신이 잘할 수 있을 거라 하더군요

translation.en: Is it something you think you can handle?
I can handle it.
COMPUTER: Going down.
It gets to you after a while, being here.
translation.ko: 여기 근무는 정신 건강에 좋지 않아요

translation.en: People get creeped out.
Before you know it, their imaginations are running wild,
they're hearing things go bump in the night.
Not me.
I believe when you die, you die.
End of story.
Good.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
At night, you can't get in or out without swiping this card.
translation.ko: 밤에는 이 카드를 긁어야 출입할 수 있어요

translation.en: If you lose it, hospital security has to let you in.
translation.ko: 잃어버리면 경비실에 말해야 들어올 수 있는데

translation.en: They will not be happy.
Most of the lights are on a sensor.
The rest you have to switch on manually.
There are a lot of files that need to be entered into the system.
translation.ko: 시신이 들어오면 기록해야 하는 정보가 많아요

translation.en: I hope you don't mind data entry.
translation.ko: 신체 정보 등록도 할 수 있겠어요?

translation.en: No, not at all.
Men's room is down there, women's room is down there,
translation.ko: 남자 화장실은 저기고 여자 화장실은 저기

translation.en: and down there to the left is the incinerator room for cremation.
translation.ko: 저기 왼쪽 끝에는 화장을 위한 소각장이 있어요

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
DR. LEWIS: This intake bay is for drop-offs only.
No drop-off, no access.
And you never leave the premises while you're on duty.
translation.ko: 근무 중에는 병원 구내에서 나가면 안 되고요

translation.en: No exceptions.
[CHIMES] COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Well, you bring the cadaver up from the intake bay,
and take it into the receiving room, which is over here.
COMPUTER: Image captured.
First you take an overview of the body and then close-ups
translation.ko: 먼저 몸 전체를 찍고 상처를 각각 확대해서 찍어요

translation.en: of each individual injury.
COMPUTER: Image captured. All right, you try.
Rigor mortis makes a corpse difficult to fingerprint.
translation.ko: 사후 경직이 일어나면 지문 채취가 어려워요

translation.en: Now, if you press on the knuckle, it will extend
translation.ko: 관절 부분을 누르면 손가락이 펴지고 다루기 쉬울 거예요

translation.en: the finger, and make it easier to handle.
Gently roll.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
This doohickey sends the prints to a crime database.
translation.ko: 이 기계는 채취한 지문을 범죄 기록과 대조해요

translation.en: Green means they're ready to go. Red means they're not.
translation.ko: 초록색이면 이상 없고 빨간색이면 문제가 있는 거예요

translation.en: Yeah.
Green...
Green means go.
Thanks, Moe. You bet, Doc.
The shift starts tomorrow night at 11, goes to 7 in the morning.
Any problems with that? Not at all.
Well, thank you for the opportunity.
I promise you won't be disappointed.
Welcome to the team.
Thanks.
Hey, do you need to see my I.D.?
Do you work here?
In the morgue. I'm Megan.
Then no.
Hey, I'm Dave.
Megan. Nice to meet you.
And, you know, welcome to the graveyard shift.
Thanks.
COMPUTER: Morgue.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Who are you? Where's Larry?
I don't know who Larry is, but I'm Megan.
COMPUTER: Morgue.
You've got to be the right kind to stomach a job like this.
Personally...
I'm not what you'd call a people person.
Dead's the way I like them.
COMPUTER: Image captured.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
Green means go.
Hey. [GASPS]
Goddamn it, Dave. Sorry.
Not funny. I didn't mean to.
translation.ko: - 하나도 재미없어요 - 일부러 그런 게 아니에요

translation.en: I honestly just came down to check on you.
Shit. I feel like an asshole. Forgive me?
I'll never do it again.
Really not funny.
Hey.
MAN 1: Why didn't you shoot me? MAN 2: Megan, do something.
translation.ko: - 왜 안 쐈어? - 뭐라도 해, 메건

translation.en: MEGAN: I don't know what triggers it, really.
A lot of things, I guess.
But I still have nightmares of what happened.
Put your hands up!
Me just...
standing there...
doing nothing.
I just freeze up and I can't move.
MAN [ON RADIO]: Officer down. Officer down.
It's okay. I've got you. I've got you.
I want it so bad sometimes.
The drink and the pills, I want them so bad.
Thank you, Megan, for sharing.
MAN: Hey.
I just, um, need the rest of my stuff.
My shift just ended, but if this is a bad time...
translation.ko: 방금 근무가 끝났거든 혹시 지금 안 되면...

translation.en: No. No, come in.
And you're still in your pajamas because...?
Oh, I, uh...
I started a new job last night. A night job.
That's great.
Doing what?
Overnight intake assistant at the morgue.
It's better than it sounds.
Yeah, I'm basically running the place at night, all on my own.
Are you sure that's a good idea, you know...
translation.ko: 지금 그렇게 오래 혼자 있는 게

translation.en: spending so much time alone right now?
Actually, I do. You know,
it keeps me from going out at night
doing things I might regret in the morning.
translation.ko: 아침이 되면 후회할 만한 짓은 안 하겠지

translation.en: It worked for Lisa and she thinks it could work for me, too.
translation.ko: 리사도 그 덕을 봐서 나도 괜찮을 것 같았대

translation.en: "Lisa"? My AA sponsor.
The nurse at the hospital.
She says it keeps her out of trouble working the night shift.
translation.ko: 야간 근무를 하면 사고 칠 일이 없대

translation.en: So, when a job opened up at the morgue, she thought of me.
translation.ko: 그래서 영안실에 자리가 났을 때 날 추천했대

translation.en: Yeah, still, too much time alone is never good for anyone.
translation.ko: 그래도 혼자 너무 오래 있는 건 좋지 않아

translation.en: Says the guy who moved out.
You didn't give me much of a choice.
That's not true, Andrew. You know that's not true.
translation.ko: 거짓말하지 마, 앤드루 알면서 왜 그래?

translation.en: Since when are you concerned about the truth?
I didn't come to...
I should go.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
I forgot my key. Could you open the door?
You don't work here.
Yes, I do. Just let me in.
Sir, back away from the door. No. No. No.
Sir. Let me in!
I'm going to call security. Back away from the door.
COMPUTER: Morgue. MAN: Let me in!
Let me in!
MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
Hey, I had a homeless guy at the intake bay.
MAN: Thanks for the heads-up. Yeah, we get that a lot.
Yeah.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Drop-off? Hey, yeah.
Ooh. You're new here.
Megan. Randy.
Could you give me a hand? I'm all alone tonight.
Sorry. I can't leave the premises.
translation.ko: 미안해요 병원 밖으로 나갈 수가 없어요

translation.en: Yes. Yeah. Stickler on the rules.
But I'll tell you right now,
if you don't help me get this thing inside,
it's going to start to rot and decay.
It's just going to blow up like a puffer fish.
And then we're both going to lose our jobs.
Unless...
What do you think? All right, okay. Fine.
Yeah? Yeah.
You're the best. My partner called in sick. Strep throat.
translation.ko: 덕분에 살았어요 동료가 인두염이라고 병가를 냈거든요

translation.en: Which is 100 percent grade-A bullshit because--
Do you want to grab that side? Yeah.
He is holing up with his psycho ex-girlfriend.
translation.ko: 정신 나간 전 여자친구와 같이 있거든요

translation.en: It seems like he should be making some new friends.
translation.ko: 그분은 다른 사람을 만나시는 게 낫겠네요

translation.en: Yeah, I think he should probably pick a better psycho ex-girlfriend next time.
translation.ko: 다음엔 좀 덜 미친 전 여자친구를 사귀면 좋겠네요

translation.en: So, I want to say thank you, by the way, because the guy who used to have this job
would never have just done that.
He was a prick. Horrendous breath.
translation.ko: 재수 없는 놈이었죠 입 냄새도 심했고

translation.en: How long have you been here? I just started.
translation.ko: 일한 지 얼마나 됐어요? 며칠 안 됐어요

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
MEGAN: What happened? RANDY: Oh, yeah, it's a bad one.
The cops found her in an alley. One, two, three.
translation.ko: 골목에서 경찰이 발견했어요 하나, 둘, 셋

translation.en: Yeah, so the guy was still slicing her.
He took off. They still haven't found him.
translation.ko: 그 남자는 도망갔고 아직 못 잡았대요

translation.en: Did they find out who he was? No clue.
"Hannah Grace."
Yeah, that's what it said on her I.D.
I told you it was bad.
That's not even the insane thing. The insane thing is
translation.ko: 이게 전부가 아니에요 이 여자 옆에서 클로로폼이 발견됐대요

translation.en: they found chloroform by her body.
What kind of a lunatic drugs a girl, smashes her head in,
translation.ko: 어떤 미친놈이 여자를 마취하고 머리를 부순 다음

translation.en: and then tries to burn her body after she's been dead?
It's someone trying to send a message.
It could have been her pimp.
It might have been a drug dealer.
It could have been a sex thing.
Thanks, Randy. I can take it from here.
translation.ko: - 평범한... - 고마워요, 랜디 - 이제 괜찮아요? - 내가 처리할게요

translation.en: All right.
Thanks for the help, Megan.
Yeah.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
It gets easier. I promise.
Thanks.
It's all part of the job.
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
translation.ko: 오류 발생 사진을 불러올 수 없음

translation.en: COMPUTER: Error.
Unable to load image.
Okay.
What?
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
translation.ko: 오류 발생 사진을 불러올 수 없음

translation.en: All right.
"Username."
Megan Reed.
"Password."
Bye-bye, Megan.
Andrew Kurtz.
"Password."
Megan.
Brown.
Get out of here.
You're losing your mind.
It's freaking hot.
Dave?
Dave, you promised.
Dave!
Oh, my God.
If you scream, I will have to slit your throat.
Do you understand? Yes.
Do you understand?
Come on. MAN [ON PHONE]: Security.
There's someone down here. Call the police now.
translation.ko: 여기 누가 있어요 - 경찰 불러요 - 네?

translation.en: MAN: What? [PHONE SLAMS CRADLE]
MAN: "As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.ko: 우리가 우리에게 죄지은 자를 사하여준 것같이

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation,
but deliver us from evil."
Stop. Put the body down.
I've already called security. There's nowhere for you to go.
translation.ko: 이미 경비실에 연락했어요 도망 못 가요

translation.en: Now, just stay calm. You don't understand.
DAVE: Megan!
Megan!
Megan!
Get off of me! Get off of me!
Please, listen to me!
You've got to destroy her body. GUARD: Get him up!
You're coming with us. Please, listen to me.
MAN: Listen. Listen. GUARD: Are you okay?
translation.ko: - 괜찮아요? - 들어봐 - 네 - 저 시신을 없애야 해

translation.en: You have to destroy her body. You've got to destroy her body.
translation.ko: - 네 - 저 시신을 없애야 해 파괴해야 한다고

translation.en: You don't know what you've done!
translation.ko: - 무슨 짓을 한 건지 몰라! - 그만해!

translation.en: You don't know what you-- She's not dead!
translation.ko: 당신들이 무슨 짓을... 아직 죽은 게 아니야!

translation.en: Hello?
ANDREW [ON PHONE]: Megan, it's Andrew. I just heard
translation.ko: - 여보세요? - 메건, 앤드루야 무슨 일 있었는지 들었어, 괜찮아?

translation.en: what happened. Are you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine, but I'm going to have to call you back.
Hey, can you open the door?
Hey. Are you okay?
Did that guy hurt you? No. No, not really.
translation.ko: - 다친 데는 없죠? - 없어요 다치지 않았어요

translation.en: [SIGHS] I'm fine. Do you want to call it a night?
I can find someone else to cover your shift.
I'm okay. Seriously, Lisa, I'm fine.
Nobody is going to hold it against you
if you just want to get out of here.
I know. But I want to stay. Okay?
translation.ko: 하지만 여기 있을게요 일할 수 있어요

translation.en: I can do this. I want to do this.
translation.ko: 하지만 여기 있을게요 일할 수 있어요 일하고 싶고요

translation.en: But you don't have to. Lisa.
I need to do this.
Okay.
What is it?
I know this is going to sound insane, but...
I heard a corpse breathe.
Breathe? Yes.
Like... an exhale.
Corpses expunge air sometimes when they're moved.
translation.ko: 시신을 움직이면 폐에서 공기가 빠져나올 수도 있어요

translation.en: Dr. Lewis didn't tell you this?
In his defense, he...
probably assumed I was smart enough to know that corpses can't breathe.
translation.ko: 시신이 숨을 쉬지 않는 것쯤은 안다고 생각하셨겠죠

translation.en: Are you hungry?
I can get us some take-out from the cafeteria.
Sure. Okay, come on.
You know, when that guy attacked me tonight...
translation.ko: 아까 그 남자가 절 공격했을 때

translation.en: my first instinct wasn't to run.
You know, I wanted to defend myself,
to stop him.
I didn't freeze.
Why couldn't I have done that
when there was a gun pointed at my partner?
And then none of this would have happened.
Look, it's just one step at a time.
This job is the next step.
Hey. Hey.
There is a cop upstairs who wants to talk to you.
translation.ko: 위에 경찰이 와서 메건을 찾고 있어요

translation.en: I can cover down here if you want.
Yeah. Yeah, okay.
How's your arm? Oh, it's good as new.
Do you want some fries?
Sure. Thanks. LISA: Here. See you.
You didn't have to come here. They already have my statement.
translation.ko: 안 와도 됐는데 - 이미 진술도 끝났고 - 나도 알아

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I was in the area.
translation.ko: - 이미 진술도 끝났고 - 나도 알아 그냥 지나가다 들렀어

translation.en: Are you okay? He didn't hurt you?
Just my ego. Did you I.D. him yet?
No, he's not talking.
We'll know more once we get him to the station.
You seem anxious.
Are you staying through the night?
That's the plan.
I just know how you get when you're stressed.
Okay, look, I appreciate you coming here, but I've got things covered.
Okay?
Is there something else?
I know this isn't the right time...
translation.ko: 이런 거 물어볼 때가 아닌 것 같지만

translation.en: but when I picked up my stuff, there was something missing.
translation.ko: 내 물건 챙길 때 없어진 게 있더라고

translation.en: A bottle of Xanax.
And you're assuming that I...
what, stole them from you? Did you? [SCOFFS]
It's a valid question.
You're not supposed to be around
controlled medications of any kind.
translation.ko: - 함부로 다루면 안 돼 - 네가 잃어버리고선

translation.en: You misplace a bottle of pills and automatically assume this.
translation.ko: - 함부로 다루면 안 돼 - 네가 잃어버리고선 - 나부터 의심하는 거야? - 왜 그렇게 민감해?

translation.en: Why are you getting so defensive?
translation.ko: - 나부터 의심하는 거야? - 왜 그렇게 민감해?

translation.en: I'm not getting defensive. I'm getting pissed.
You know, it's as if you're completely incapable of giving me the benefit of the doubt.
translation.ko: 나한텐 무죄 추정의 원칙도 적용되지 않나 봐?

translation.en: If you ever need my help, I'm just a call away. Okay?
Actually, there is something you can help me with.
I'll be right back.
Hey.
How's it going? I'm good. How are you?
I'll just be another minute if that's okay.
Yeah, no problem. Take your time.
Bases loaded, three-and-two count, down by three.
The stakes could not be higher.
Here comes the pitch. It's a heater.
It's a grand slam!
Can you run these for me at the station?
translation.ko: 서에서 이것 좀 봐줄 수 있어?

translation.en: The scanner broke down before I could run her prints.
translation.ko: 지문 조회도 못 했는데 기계가 망가졌어

translation.en: Her? Hannah Grace.
ANDREW: You already have her I.D.
I think that I.D. is fake.
The picture on her license doesn't match.
Her eye color, it's different.
What? Once a cop...
Just get me the prints, okay?
You got it.
Dave?
I mean, seriously.
Dave?
Dave?
Hello?
Dave, is that you?
Are you sure you gave me the right prints?
Positive. The results are odd.
Why do you say that?
Because according to the prints,
Hannah Grace has been dead for three months.
It must be a glitch in the system. It wouldn't be the first time.
Is everything else okay?
Megan.
Yeah, thanks.
Wait, what?
Hey, Dave, where the hell are you, man?
Is everything all right?
The security cameras downstairs... Yeah?
Can I access the morgue footage?
I can't leave the desk unmanned, but...
here you go.
Thanks.
[GASPS] Oh, my God.
Come on, Megan. Just breathe.
WOMAN [ON PA]: Lab Tech Hernandez, please dial 1-6-6-7.
Hey, can I talk to you for a sec?
Yeah. Excuse me.
translation.ko: - 잠깐 얘기 가능할까요? - 네 - 실례할게요 - 네

translation.en: So, I thought I saw someone in the bathroom.
When I went to check the security footage,
I mean, I could have sworn it was her.
Meg, who is "her"? What are you talking about?
I need to show you something.
There.
What is that?
I don't know.
Well, I mean, it looks like a shadow.
It's not a shadow.
Look, when that guy broke in...
he kept talking about the woman he killed...
translation.ko: 자기가 죽인 여자에 대해 뭔가 말했어요

translation.en: Hannah Grace, how she wasn't really dead.
I looked her up.
She died three months ago during an exorcism.
You know I don't believe in that kind of stuff, but...
translation.ko: 전 유령 같은 건 믿지 않지만...

translation.en: ...this, to me, is not a shadow.
What is this?
Lisa, I didn't take any.
Are you lying to me? No, okay?
You need to believe me on this one.
I promise you, I didn't take any.
I wanted to, but I didn't.
I've just had them in my bag for comfort. I promise.
translation.ko: 위안 삼아 들고 다닌 거예요 맹세할게요

translation.en: Meg, do you...?
Do you remember when we were in meetings
and they started talking about coping mechanisms?
translation.ko: 대응 기제에 대해 이야기한 거 기억해요?

translation.en: Yeah.
An addict's brain tries to find new ways to cope with stress.
translation.ko: 약에 중독된 뇌는 스트레스에 대처할 방법을 찾으려 해요

translation.en: Everything that has happened to you today, the stress that it has caused,
translation.ko: 오늘 일어난 사건으로 스트레스를 심하게 받아서

translation.en: your brain is desperate to find a way to cope with it.
translation.ko: 뇌가 거기에 대응하기 위한 방법을 찾는 거예요

translation.en: And it is going to do anything it can to convince you to use again.
translation.ko: 약을 할 구실을 만들기 위해 당신을 속이는 거죠

translation.en: My brain did not put a corpse on the security footage.
translation.ko: 감시카메라에 시신이 찍힌 것도 제 뇌 때문인가요?

translation.en: Look, I don't know what that thing is,
but what I do know is you're jumping to the least plausible explanation.
translation.ko: 메건은 지금 가장 비합리적인 결론으로 치닫고 있잖아요

translation.en: And right now you've got to focus.
So, don't see things that aren't there.
Here. No.
Just take them. No.
I trust you.
Okay.
Dave?
Are you okay?
Dave?
Dave?
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
RANDY: I brought you a present.
Can you give me a hand again? Sorry. I can't help you out.
translation.ko: 이번에도 좀 도와줘요 미안하지만 안 돼요 안 좋은 꼴을 당해서요

translation.en: Not after last time. What? Why? What happened?
translation.ko: 미안하지만 안 돼요 안 좋은 꼴을 당해서요 무슨 일 있었어요?

translation.en: You wouldn't believe me if I told you.
Okay. Well, try me.
MEGAN: So, it's obviously been a long night...
and I'm probably just remembering things wrong.
She had a huge wound... going down this side of her abdomen
translation.ko: 당신이 이 시신을 가져왔을 땐 옆구리에 큰 상처가 있었어요

translation.en: when you dropped her off. Correct?
translation.ko: 당신이 이 시신을 가져왔을 땐 옆구리에 큰 상처가 있었어요 그렇죠?

translation.en: Yeah, I could have sworn that she did.
So, where is it now?
And her arm was banged up too, right?
Yeah. Have you checked the admittance photos?
translation.ko: 맞아요 처음 찍은 사진과 대조해 봤어요?

translation.en: The camera broke down and when I tried to scan her prints, the scanner died too.
translation.ko: 카메라가 망가졌어요 지문을 찍자 스캐너도 망가졌고요

translation.en: That's weird.
So, I had a friend run her prints at the police station.
translation.ko: 그래서 경찰서의 친구한테 지문 조회를 부탁했어요

translation.en: And? Hannah Grace,
she died three months ago during an exorcism.
Whoa. When that man broke in,
he said she wasn't really dead,
translation.ko: 이 여자는 죽은 게 아니라고 했어요

translation.en: and now it's almost like she's healing herself.
translation.ko: 게다가 시신이 낫고 있는 것처럼 보이고요

translation.en: Can I ask you a personal question?
How personal?
Why are you working the night shift at a morgue?
translation.ko: 왜 영안실에서 야간 근무를 하는 거예요?

translation.en: Because it's my job.
No, no. You're smart and resourceful.
So, what happened?
You know what? Actually, it's not even--
I'm sorry. It's not my business.
[SIGHS] I had a rough patch a few years back and...
translation.ko: 몇 년 전에 힘든 시기를 겪었거든요 왠지 그때의 나와 비슷해 보여서요

translation.en: I don't know, I guess I thought I saw that in you.
I'm sure that there is a rational explanation for all of this.
You just-- Megan, you've got to be careful
translation.ko: 지금은 그냥... 메건, 너무 이상한 생각에 휘둘리지 않게 조심해요

translation.en: that you don't drive yourself crazy here.
translation.ko: 메건, 너무 이상한 생각에 휘둘리지 않게 조심해요

translation.en: I know.
He's adorable.
I used to have a drinking problem.
And I would get drunk... and lie and cheat and...
people told me that I was a dick sometimes.
All the time.
And then...
this guy shows up...
and he made me want to be a better person.
translation.ko: 아이를 위해 더 나은 사람이 되고 싶었죠

translation.en: So...
I quit drinking...
I quit lying...
and then I was finally able to be honest with the people that love me...
translation.ko: 그러자 내가 사랑하는 사람들에게 정직해질 수 있었어요

translation.en: because I was finally able to be honest with myself.
If you ever want to talk, I'm the guy.
Thank you.
Have a good night. You, too. Get home safe.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
Hey, I was just about to call you.
That bottle of Xanax that you were looking for...
I didn't take it.
Megan, you already told me this.
I found it in the medicine cabinet after you moved out.
translation.ko: 네가 집을 나간 뒤에 약 보관함에서 발견했어

translation.en: And I should have packed it up with the rest of your things...
translation.ko: 다른 짐이랑 같이 싸서 줬어야 했는데

translation.en: but I kept it.
I've just been feeling anxious lately...
and I felt safer knowing that they were there.
You know, in case I needed them.
Why are you telling me this?
Because I'm tired of lying.
Anyway, I'll drop them off
translation.ko: 어쨌든... 내일 아침에도 서에 있으면 가져다줄게

translation.en: tomorrow morning if you're there.
Yeah, I'll be there. I'm glad you told me, okay?
translation.ko: 응, 거기 있을 거야 말해줘서 다행이다

translation.en: Me, too. Bye. Bye.
translation.ko: 나도 그렇게 생각해 - 또 봐 - 그래

translation.en: COMPUTER: Going down.
This is Randy, drop-off complete.
Goddamn it.
Hello?
Hello?
Randy.
Randy?
Oh, my God.
Randy.
Andrew.
Megan, go to security right now.
The guy who broke into the morgue killed the two officers transporting him to the station.
translation.ko: 영안실에 침입했던 남자가 이송 중에 경관 둘을 살해했어

translation.en: We have an APB out on him, but there's a chance he could make--
translation.ko: 이미 수배령을 내렸지만 어쩌면 그 사람이...

translation.en: Move. ANDREW: Megan?
Megan?
Open it.
Get the lift.
Do you see what's happening to her body?
She's healing.
She heals herself by killing people and then she rests.
translation.ko: 사람들을 죽이고 쉬는 걸로 몸을 회복하는 거야

translation.en: Why hasn't she killed you?
I don't know.
I believe you.
There's something evil hiding inside.
translation.ko: 이 안에 뭔가 사악한 게 도사리고 있어

translation.en: The church...
said to walk away...
but I couldn't give up on my only child.
translation.ko: 하지만 하나밖에 없는 딸을 포기할 수 없었어

translation.en: That's your daughter?
Not anymore.
Hannah struggled with depression... anxiety.
It worked on her...
day after day...
till it broke her...
...found its way inside her body.
Is that when her eye changed?
Yeah.
That's the demon's mark.
No matter how many exorcisms they performed, it stayed.
translation.ko: 구마 의식을 아무리 시도해도 악마는 사라지지 않았어

translation.en: One last...
...attempt.
In the name of God, in the name of Jesus Christ...
translation.ko: 하나님과 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 이름으로 명하노니

translation.en: our Lord, be gone!
translation.ko: 하나님과 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 이름으로 명하노니 떠날지어다!

translation.en: You have to understand...
...I did what I did...
...to save the lives of others.
But the demon was too powerful.
It stayed.
The next day, when we went to bury her...
...her body, it disappeared from the mortuary.
Four people were dead.
We have to get her to the incinerator.
The knife wasn't enough.
The only way to destroy this thing is to burn her.
Anything else just slows her down.
GRAINGER: No!
Come and get me!
No! Stop! [SCREAMING]
No!
Stop!
No!
Come on. Come on.
Come on.
Come on.
Come on!
COMPUTER: Mezzanine.
No.
COMPUTER: Going up.
COMPUTER: Arrived at mezzanine.
Officer Kurtz, reporting a 10-65.
translation.ko: 커츠 경관으로부터 무장 강도 사건 보고

translation.en: I need backup at Boston Metro Hospital, possible homicide.
translation.ko: 보스턴 메트로 병원에 지원 바람 살인 사건 가능성이 있음

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Megan?
Megan?
Megan?
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
Oh, God.
Oh, God.
Fuck.
Who's there? It's Officer Kurtz.
Megan's friend. Where is she? Yeah, I don't know.
translation.ko: 메건의 친구죠 - 메건은 어디 있죠? - 나도 몰라요

translation.en: Dave's missing, too.
Everything's down. What's going on down here?
Oh, God.
ANDREW: Megan. Andrew. Oh, my God.
What happened? We have to get out of here.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이야? 괜찮아? - 나가 빨리 나가야 해

translation.en: [SCREECHING NOISE] ANDREW: What the hell is that?
Come on.
What? Oh, my God. Come on! Come on!
Hey!
COMPUTER: Going down.
ERNIE: Megan!
Hey, stop!
Hannah, no.
MEGAN: No!
Let him go!
Megan.
Megan.
Andrew. Are you okay?
MEGAN: Okay, come on. Hurry. We don't have much time.
Go get help. Wait. What? Megan.
No! Help me, please!
MEGAN: I'm 62 days clean...
...and I'm thankful for how far I've come.
It's not easy.
And I know I have a long way to go...
but I'm feeling stronger every day.
Nothing's going to stop me now.
